title: Update app branding from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'

requirements.summary: Update the application title in index.html from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'
acceptanceCriteria: The <title> tag in index.html displays 'Axora AI'
Browser tab shows 'Axora AI' when the app is loaded

file_operations.description: Change the <title> tag content from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI' to update the browser tab title

requirements.summary: Update the Header component logo text from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'
acceptanceCriteria: The header displays 'Axora AI' as the application name
Logo text is visible and properly styled

file_operations.description: Replace 'Hollow AI' text with 'Axora AI' in the logo/branding section of the header component

requirements.summary: Replace any remaining references to 'Hollow AI' with 'Axora AI' throughout the frontend interface
acceptanceCriteria: No instances of 'Hollow AI' remain in user-facing text

file_operations.description: Search for and replace any 'Hollow AI' references with 'Axora AI' in comments, alt text, aria-labels, and user-facing strings
Replace any 'Hollow AI' references with 'Axora AI' in accessibility labels or text content
Update any 'Hollow AI' references to 'Axora AI' in bot avatar labels or system messages
Replace 'Hollow AI' with 'Axora AI' in any instructional text or labels
Update 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI' in any UI text or generation labels
Replace 'Hollow AI' with 'Axora AI' in any interface text or placeholders
